shortdesc.ph: Sets the properties of an extension provider.
Sets a property for the plugin provider.
Sets a property for the extension provider.
Sets the properties of the extension provider.

p.codeblock: Future<void> setExtensionProviderProperty( {required String provider, required String key, required String value});
public abstract int SetExtensionProviderProperty(string provider, string key, string value);

section.p: You can call this method to set the properties of an extension provider and initialize related parameters based on the provider type.
You can call this method to set properties for the plugin provider and initialize related parameters based on the provider type.
You can call this method to set the properties of the extension provider and initialize related parameters based on the provider type.
You can call this method to set the properties of the extension provider and initialize related parameters based on the provider type.
section.note: To set properties for multiple extension providers, you need to call this method multiple times.
To set properties for multiple plugin providers, call this method multiple times.
To set properties for multiple extension providers, call this method multiple times.
To set properties for multiple extension providers, call this method multiple times.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method after and before .
Call this method after and before .
Call this method after and before .
Call this method after and before .

plentry.pd: The name of the extension provider.
The key of the extension property.
The value corresponding to the extension property key.
The name of the plugin provider.
The key of the plugin property.
The value corresponding to the plugin property key.
The name of the extension provider.
The key of the extension property.
The value corresponding to the extension property key.
The name of the extension provider.
The key of the extension property.
The value corresponding to the extension property key.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
